Text:
sounds great! my only beef is, the album is mono, but the files are not. I've noticed that when people rip mono records they rip them in stereo. Flac tracks can support any number of channels, including mono. Check out my Neil Young - The Loner to see what I mean

it's not a big deal but your listening to the same channel twice technically.

Still a great rip!! thanks :D

LOL!

Why would someone rip in mono, when the files are played on a stereo sound system?

Would be ridiculous to have sound coming from only one channel, no?
Mono playes out of what ever is plugged into it, it will play out of both speakers.
